name: Tanishka
greetingText: I hope you will like this :)
wishText: Happy Birthday Tanishka. I wish your year will be filled with technology hacks and plenty of coding. Have fun! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Btw do talk with me in ur ups and downs, I'll always there for you as a friend ‚ù§Ô∏èüôå
replayText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
